name: Sortisigen
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues with Island Creole loanwords
tide-rituals tied to daily work rhythms
diet: salted fish, preserved kelp, ship-baked bread
local crafts emphasize watertight joinery and glassware for reagents
constraints: no instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics
notes: near-medieval to early-industrial tech with localized ritual magic
navigational auguries used but do not replace charts/seamanship
